thread.title: Lucas' header lifts Griz over PSU
thread.title_full: Lucas' header lifts Griz over PSU

author: Gazette Staff
title: Lucas' header lifts Griz over PSU
text:
Lucas' header lifts Griz over PSU Gazette Staff 0 
MISSOULA â€” Sophomore Allie Lucas scored on a header in the 87th minute to lift Montana to a 1-0 victory over Portland State in Big Sky Conference soccer Friday at South Campus Stadium. 
Lucas, a former standout at Billings Central, scored the goal on a cross from Mackenzie Akins, beating PSU goalkeeper Angela Haluska. 
Montana allowed three shots on goal, and all were stopped by goalkeeper Kailey Norman. 
The Grizzlies improved to 7-9-2 overall and 4-4-1 in the Big Sky. Portland State is 5-12-0 and 3-6-0. Tags
